document_data.name: Joluv
document_data.mainbody:
'''Joluv''' was a [[merchant]] specializing in the sale of [[Item enchantment|enchanted]] [[weapon]]s, who lived during the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''I have recently arrived from the [[Ten Towns]] of Icewind Dale. It was a long trek, but I wanted to get the most value I could from the items I had collected up north. Athkatla is known as the richest city in all of Faerûn, so I knew there would be adventurers about with the amount of coin I was looking for. Would you like to take a look at my wares?''|Joluv}}
document_data.Possessions:
Within his collection, Joluv had a amassed no less than ten weapons that were distinct to the region of [[Icewind Dale]]. Some of these were quite old, dating as far back as the 13{{th}} century.

Many of these weapons were the personal armaments of important individuals. Among them was the ''[[staff of Arundel|staff]]'' carried by [[Arundel|Archdruid Arundel]] and the ''[[Spear of Kuldahar]]'', destined to belong to [[Kuldahar|that village's]] great defender.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, Joluv could be found selling his wares at the [[Copper Coronet]] tavern, in the slums of [[Athkatla]].
